Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec™ Chlamydia trachomatis (CT) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
Specimen Type(s): Gynecological specimens collected in PreservCyt Solution
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Chlamydia trachomatis (CT) Qx Amplified DNA Assay using SDA and BD Viper System for detection of Chlamydia trachomatis DNA in swab, urine, and gynecological specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Direct, qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis DNA in clinician-collected female endocervical and male urethral swab specimens, patient-collected vaginal swab specimens, male and female urine specimens, and gynecological specimens collected in PreservCyt Solution, for diagnosis of chlamydial urogenital disease in symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals
